attributes.action: Cut to zero fuel duties and vat
attributes.additional_details: This would be the fairest way to cut the rising costs and would allow producers to still be paid. The population and businesses would be more able to carry on and keep the economy alive
attributes.background: For the duration of this fuel emergency the government should remove all levies, taxes and vat

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for the same actions: 

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908
